abstract: The new ads for the Microsoft search engine focus on young athletes, or as one executive put it, “real people doing inspiring, cool things and inspiring other real people to do inspiring, cool things.”
snippet: The new ads for the Microsoft search engine focus on young athletes, or as one executive put it, “real people doing inspiring, cool things and inspiring other real people to do inspiring, cool things.”
lead_paragraph: Bing, the search engine from Microsoft, is changing advertising approaches for the first time since 2009, when it bing-ed its first “bing.”

headline.main: In New Ads for Bing, ‘Doing’ Is the Thing
